page.title: 15Transport
page.content: There are 3 large settlements close to Tonbridge.Southborough is 4KM along the main road south to Tunbridge Wells,which is 8KM away,Sevenoaks is 11KM away on the road going north. These roads have 1 traffic lane in each direction.A 4 lane main road by_passes both Tonbridge and Sevenoaks taking "through traffic"round the towns.Regular bus routes serve these towns and other villages.Approx 80% of families in this area have a car. Tonbridge station links the town with London and the coast.It is 45 minutes to London and an hour to the coast. Trains go every 30 minutes.From Dover people may take their car to Europe. There are also rail links with outlying villages like Leigh and Penshurst. Gatwick is the nearest airport,30 minutes drive from Tonbridge.
